channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump taps Colin McDonald for newly-created role of assistant attorney general for fraud enforcement
item.description: President Donald Trump nominated Colin McDonald as assistant attorney general for national fraud enforcement in a newly created DOJ division.

item.title: Job clingers, beware: research shows you’re more likely to regret staying in a bad job than quitting it
